item.title: 欧盟《数字市场法》助力大型科技公司的小型竞争对手
item.description: 随着全球最大的科技公司为遵守欧盟具有里程碑意义的《数字市场法案》（Digital Markets Act）而对其核心在线服务进行改造，这些变化可能会给一些较小的竞争对手甚至同行带来竞争优势。【原文：As the world's biggest tech companies revamp their core online services to comply with the European Union's landmark Digital Markets Act, the changes could give some smaller rivals and even peers a competitive edge.】

item.title: Binance 必须面对投资者在美国就加密货币损失再次提起的诉讼
item.description: 联邦上诉法院周五重启了一起诉讼，投资者指控全球最大的加密货币交易所 Binance 违反美国证券法，出售未经注册的代币，导致代币价值大幅缩水。【原文：A federal appeals court on Friday revived a lawsuit where investors accused Binance, the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange, of violating U.S. securities laws by selling unregistered tokens that lost much of their value.】

item.title: 英伟达即将超越苹果，成为市值第二高的公司
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）正紧随苹果公司之后，成为全球估值第二高的公司，因为投资者对这家半导体制造商爱不释手，其芯片为 ChatGPT 等流行的人工智能工具提供了动力。【原文：Nvidia is nipping at the heels of Apple to become the world's second-most-valuable company, as investors cannot get enough of the semiconductor maker whose chips power popular artificial intelligence tools such as ChatGPT.】

item.title: 斯泰兰特将于 2025 年下半年推出新款阿尔法-罗密欧 Stelvio SUV
item.description: Stellantis 旗下的意大利高端品牌阿尔法-罗密欧（Alfa Romeo）周五表示，将于明年下半年推出新款 Stelvio 运动型多功能车（SUV），随后将于 2026 年推出新款 Giulia 运动型轿车。【原文：Stellantis' Alfa Romeo will launch its new Stelvio sport utility vehicle (SUV) in the second half of next year, followed by the new Giulia sport sedan in 2026, the Italian premium brand said on Friday.】

item.title: 德国联邦检察官调查特斯拉纵火案
item.description: 德国联邦检察官办公室已接手调查特斯拉德国柏林附近工厂因纵火而断电的事件，并调查恐怖主义指控。【原文：Germany's federal prosecutors office has taken over the investigation into an arson attack that has cut power supplies to Tesla's German plant near Berlin, looking into charges of terrorism.】

item.title: 比特币升至超过 70,000 美元的历史新高
item.description: 随着加密货币狂热继续席卷投资界，比特币在周五的震荡交易中反弹至历史新高。【原文：Bitcoin rallied to a record high on Friday in volatile trade, as crypto mania continued to sweep through the investment community.】

item.title: Rivian 新推出的 R2 SUV 吸引了大量早期订单，销量激增
item.description: Rivian周五大涨7%，因为其廉价的R2 SUV在推出数小时内就获得了数以万计的预订，这助长了人们对这家电动汽车制造商在大众市场领域扩张的乐观情绪。【原文：Rivian jumped 7% on Friday as its cheaper R2 SUV racked up tens of thousands of reservations within hours of its launch, fueling optimism that the electric-vehicle maker could expand in the mass-market segment.】

item.title: 美联储又多了一个不急于降息的理由
item.description: 周五，美联储决策者在权衡何时开始降息时又多了一个暂时按兵不动的理由，因为一份政府报告显示，2月份就业增长迅猛，但整体劳动力市场继续呈现降温迹象。【原文：Federal Reserve policymakers weighing when to start interest-rate cuts got another reason Friday to sit tight for now, after a government report showed jobs growth surged in February but the overall labor market continued to show signs of cooling.】

item.title: 美国财政部部长耶伦告诉 MSNBC：住房税收抵免有助于供应
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周五表示，美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）提出的针对特定购房者的税收减免建议将有助于增加美国的住房供应，使人们更能负担得起住房。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden's proposed tax credit for certain home buyers could help boost the nation's housing supply and make homes more affordable, Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said on Friday, a day after the president unveiled the proposal amid his annual State of the Union speech.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司股息希望落空，市值损失 140 亿美元
item.description: 由于分析师质疑巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）将如何使用其不断增长的现金储备，巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）微薄的股息导致其股价周五暴跌，市值损失超过 700 亿雷亚尔（约合 140 亿美元）。【原文：A meager dividend from Brazil's state-run oil company Petrobras sent its shares plunging on Friday, erasing more than 70 billion reais ($14 billion) from its market value as analysts questioned how the firm would spend its growing cash reserves.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，欧洲央行部分政策制定者希望在 6 月和 7 月连续两次降息
item.description: 三位消息人士周五表示，欧洲央行决策者压倒性地支持在6月份首次降息，一些决策者非正式地提出了在7月份进一步降息的想法，以争取一小部分希望更早开始降息的决策者的支持。【原文：European Central Bank policymakers overwhelmingly back June for a first interest rate cut and some have informally floated the idea of a further move in July to win over a small group that would prefer an earlier start, three sources said on Friday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Partners 考虑出售德国可再生能源公司 VSB
item.description: 六位知情人士透露，Partners 集团正在探索出售德国可再生能源公司 VSB 集团的方案。【原文：Partners Group is exploring options, including a sale, FOR German renewable energy company VSB Group, six sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 奥迪将全资控股索伯 F1 车队
item.description: 大众汽车旗下品牌奥迪周五表示，奥迪计划在索伯一级方程式车队从2026年起转型为德国汽车制造商的工厂车队之前，100%控制该车队。【原文：Audi plans to take 100% control of the Sauber Formula One team ahead of its transformation into the German carmaker's factory team from 2026, the Volkswagen-owned brand said on Friday.】

item.title: 降息预期升温，美国债券基金吸引 2021 年中期以来最大单周资金流入
item.description: 截至 3 月 6 日的七天内，美国债券基金大量流入，原因是制造业数据疲软和美联储官员的鸽派言论提高了今年晚些时候降息的预期。【原文：U.S. bond funds racked up large inflows in the seven days to March 6 as weaker manufacturing data and dovish comments from Federal Reserve officials raised expectations for interest rate cuts later this year.】

item.title: 微软称俄罗斯国家赞助的黑客已能访问内部系统
item.description: 微软周五表示，俄罗斯国家支持的黑客组织 "午夜暴雪"（Midnight Blizzard）在美国公司于今年 1 月检测到黑客攻击后，已获得了对其部分源代码库和内部系统的访问权限。【原文：Microsoft said on Friday that Russian state-sponsored hacking group Midnight Blizzard have gained access to some of its source code repositories and internal systems, after a hack that was detected by the U.S. company in January.】

item.title: 美国 2 月就业人数显示劳动力市场健康但不过度紧张
item.description: 2 月份，美国就业增长加速，但失业率上升和工资涨幅放缓，使美联储 6 月份降息的预期继续搁置。【原文：U.S. job growth accelerated in February, but a rise in the unemployment rate and moderation in wage gains kept on the table an anticipated interest rate cut in June from the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份就业增长加速；失业率升至 3.9
item.description: 2 月份，美国就业增长加速，但失业率上升和工资涨幅放缓，使美联储 6 月份降息的预期继续搁置。【原文：U.S. job growth accelerated in February, but a rise in the unemployment rate and moderation in wage gains kept on the table an anticipated interest rate cut in June from the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 独家报道：海湾石油巨头沙特阿美和阿德诺克将目光投向锂业
item.description: 三位消息人士告诉路透社，沙特阿拉伯和阿拉伯联合酋长国的国家石油公司计划从其油田的卤水中提取锂，以配合其经济多元化的努力，并从电动汽车（EV）的转变中获利。【原文：Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates' national oil companies plan to extract lithium from brine in their oilfields, in line with efforts to diversify their economies and profit from the shift to electric vehicles (EVs), three sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯：中性利率可能仍然偏低
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）周五表示，在冠状病毒大流行之后，他怀疑利率的 "中性 "状态并没有上升多少。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said Friday that he suspects the "neutral" state of interest rates hasn't risen much in the wake of the coronavirus pandemic.】

item.title: 诺和诺德希望在本十年内推出试验性肥胖症药物
item.description: 诺和诺德公司的研发主管周五告诉路透社，他非常确信该制药公司将能够在本十年内推出实验性减肥药淀粉样蛋白的药丸版本。【原文：Novo Nordisk's head of development on Friday told Reuters he was very comfortable the drugmaker would be able to launch the pill version of its experimental weight loss drug amycretin this decade.】

item.title: 电动汽车初创企业如何应对需求疲软？
item.description: 美国电动汽车初创企业正在转向更便宜的车型，为其增产计划踩刹车并裁员，以应对因借贷成本高昂和车辆维修费用高昂而导致的需求下滑。【原文：U.S. electric vehicle startups are turning to cheaper models, slamming the brakes on their production ramp-up plans and laying off employees to navigate a slump in demand due to steep borrowing costs and high repair expenses for the vehicles.】

item.title: 联合健康黑客攻击可能需要数月才能完全恢复
item.description: 安全专家说，美国最大的医疗保险公司联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）可能需要几个月的时间才能从网络攻击中完全恢复。【原文：UnitedHealth Group , the largest U.S. health insurer, is likely to need several months to make a full recovery from a cyberattack that has been one of the most disruptive hacks against America's healthcare infrastructure, security experts said.】

item.title: 降息预期升温，全球股票基金吸引 65 亿美元资金流入
item.description: 截至 3 月 6 日的七天内，全球股票基金净吸引资金 65 亿美元，主要原因是美国制造业数据疲软，以及美联储决策者的讲话助长了今年晚些时候降息的预期。【原文：Global equity funds attracted a net $6.5 billion in the seven days through March 6, driven by weak U.S. manufacturing data and Federal Reserve policymakers' remarks which fuelled expectations of interest rate cuts later this year.】

item.title: 美银美林称科技股创历史最大单周流出量
item.description: 美国银行周五援引 EPFR 的数据称，截至本周三的一周内，投资者抛售科技股，继续将资金投入投资级债券和现金等价物。【原文：Investors dumped technology stocks and continued to pour money into investment grade bonds and cash equivalents in the week to Wednesday, Bank of America, citing data from EPFR said on Friday.】

item.title: 诺和诺德首席执行官表示，肥胖症领域的创新可能成为某些细分市场提高价格的理由
item.description: 诺和诺德公司首席执行官周五告诉路透社记者，随着肥胖症药物的价格逐渐下降，预计会有更多的人服用这种药物，他还补充说，新一代药物将证明在某些细分市场上价格上涨是合理的。【原文：Novo Nordisk's CEO expects more people to take obesity drugs as prices fall over time, he told Reuters on Friday, adding that new generations of the medicine will justify higher prices in some segments.】

item.title: 聚焦：地区动荡一年后，美国小企业在信贷方面举步维艰
item.description: 由于一年前利率上调和银行倒闭的影响挥之不去，美国的小企业主很难从传统贷款机构获得融资，这阻碍了一些企业的业务增长。【原文：Small business owners in the U.S. are struggling to get financing from traditional lenders as the impact of higher rates and bank failures of a year ago linger, holding back business growth for some.】

item.title: 洞察力：雪佛龙首席执行官在竞购赫斯时面临终身挑战
item.description: 雪佛龙公司首席执行官迈克尔-沃思（Michael Wirth）正面临着与埃克森美孚公司的正面交锋，他以 530 亿美元的价格竞购赫斯公司及其在石油热点圭亚那的股份，可能会陷入南美两大能源竞争对手之间的争端。【原文：Chevron CEO Michael Wirth is facing a head-to-head match with Exxon Mobil with his $53 billion bid for Hess and its stake in oil hotspot Guyana, and could wind up trapped in a dispute between two of South America’s biggest energy rivals.】

item.title: 美国华尔街冲浪回升，就业降温引人关注
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 消息人士称，日本央行倾向于在 3 月份退出负利率政策
item.description: 四位熟悉日本央行想法的消息人士称，越来越多的日本央行决策者开始倾向于在本月结束负利率，因为预计今年的年度工资谈判将大幅加薪。【原文：A growing number of Bank of Japan policymakers are warming to the idea of ending negative interest rates this month on expectations of hefty pay hikes in this year's annual wage negotiations, four sources familiar with its thinking said.】

item.title: 诺和诺德首席执行官表示，复方塞马鲁肽对美国健康构成严重威胁
item.description: 诺和诺德首席执行官周五表示，美国的复方塞马鲁肽是一个严重的健康问题。【原文：Novo Nordisk's CEO on Friday said compounded semaglutide in the United States is a serious health issue.】
